post:
**Deploy your new KVM VPS on our recently upgraded infrastructure, with new nodes that have the latest Intel GOLD CPUs, DDR4 Memory and multiple 10G Internet connections.**

**All Cloud VPS are available in the United States (New York, Miami, Dallas, Los Angeles) & Europe (Paris, Madrid, Amsterdam, Stockholm, Manchester, Frankfurt, Bucharest).**

---------

Here is our offer for LET: 

**CLOUD VPS XS**  -~~ €35.40 ~~ €19.95 per Year
15GB SSD
1 Core Processor
512MB Memory
1Gbps Connection
1 IPv4 Address
/64 IPv6 Subnet
1TB Bandwidth
KVM Virtualization
**ORDER NOW:** [https://www.virtono.com/cloud-vps](https://www.virtono.com/cloud-vps "https://www.virtono.com/cloud-vps")

**CLOUD VPS S** - ~~€47.40~~ €29.95 per Year
25GB SSD
1 Core Processor
1GB Memory
1Gbps Connection
1 IPv4 Address
/64 IPv6 Subnet
2TB Bandwidth
KVM Virtualization
**ORDER NOW:** [https://www.virtono.com/cloud-vps](https://www.virtono.com/cloud-vps "https://www.virtono.com/cloud-vps")

**CLOUD VPS M** - ~~€107.40~~ €53.70 per Year (50% Discount)
50GB SSD
1 Core / 2 Threads
2GB Memory
1Gbps Connection
Up to 4 IPv4 Address
/64 IPv6 Subnet
3TB Bandwidth
KVM Virtualization
**ORDER NOW:** [https://www.virtono.com/cloud-vps](https://www.virtono.com/cloud-vps "https://www.virtono.com/cloud-vps")

_All VPS plans are instantly set up! Latest os versions from CentOS, Fedora, Debian, Ubuntu and others are available. You can also upload your own iso and install OS via VNC._

---------

## **==> Comment below** with your order number and we will double your VPS's _memory_ or _bandwidth_ 

You can **double the RAM or BANDWIDTH for FREE** for any Cloud VPS plan, not just for the offers posted here, no matter the billing cycle. 

To benefit of this giveaway you should order in our new locations: _New York, US; Paris, FR; Madrid, ES; Amsterdam, NL; Stockholm, SE._ 

This is a limited offer, _only for the first 10 orders_, so you should hurry up in order to make sure that you get your server with double resources!

Just comment bellow with your order number and we'll get back to you ASAP.

---------
